name: Honchkrow
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called “Summoner of Night.”

poke_power.name: Darkness Restore
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Honchkrow is your Active Pokémon and your opponent’s Bench isn’t full, you may use this power. Search your opponent’s discard pile for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto his or her bench. This power can’t be used if Honchkrow is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Riot
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Pokémon that isn’t an evolved Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent’s).
